backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for a veterinary surgery case management system with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to their titles, associated files, component dependencies, and test IDs for the workflow-icons system and other frontend features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend architecture.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app icon, manifest, theme color, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for auth/API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: Culture workflow icon component rendering three small circles inside a larger circle using WorkflowIconBase with the culture color token.
Discharge workflow icon component rendering a document with a checkmark using WorkflowIconBase with the discharge color token.
Renders a follow-up workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a circular arrow SVG path in the followup color.
Renders a histology workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with microscope-related SVG paths in the histo color.
Renders an imaging workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a chart-in-rectangle SVG shape in the imaging color.
Renders a labs workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a test tube SVG shape in the labs color.
Renders a notification workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a speech bubble SVG path in the notified color.
Renders a surgery workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with a document and scalpel SVG shape in the surgery color.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a WorkflowType string to the corresponding workflow icon component and renders it.
Base SVG wrapper component that applies consistent size, stroke color, and stroke style for all workflow icons.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Defines shared design tokens for workflow icons including per-type colors, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to define an authentication context; currently has no implementation.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to define an authentication view component; currently has no implementation.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, clearing the React Query cache on logout.
Empty file intended to define a login form component; currently has no implementation.
Empty file intended to define a logout button component; currently has no implementation.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to define a registration form component; currently has no implementation.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to hold authentication validation logic; currently has no implementation.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist items for surgery case tasks, including metadata and helper functions to compute default selections, remaining items, and completed task counts.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to define a camera capture modal component; currently has no implementation.
Displays a surgery case summary card with patient info, species icon, and an expandable checklist of workflow tasks that can be toggled as completed.
Dialog for editing an existing surgery case's patient details, dates, and task checklist selections, submitting changes via an update mutation.
Dialog for creating a new surgery case with form fields, task selections, speech-to-text quick fill, and auto-population from previous cases.

Main list view component for surgery cases that handles filtering by species, task types, and completion status, sorting, searching, and rendering case cards with support for highlighting a specific case and CSV/PDF export.
A search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A checklist editor component that supports both creation mode (selecting which tasks apply) and completion mode (marking tasks as done), rendering each task with its icon and color styling.
A panel component that handles CSV export of all cases and CSV import with progress tracking, error reporting, and backend create/update mutations for each parsed case.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A React date input component that supports manual MM/DD/YYYY text entry with auto-formatting and a calendar popover picker, forwarding refs and calling an optional onComplete callback when a valid date is entered.
Provides exportCasesToCsv and importCasesFromCsv functions for serializing/deserializing SurgeryCase records to/from CSV files, including row-level validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter SurgeryCase arrays by species, selected task types with incomplete tasks, all-tasks-completed status, or exclusion of fully completed cases.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript accumulation, error handling, and browser support detection.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Exports preprocessOcrText, which normalizes whitespace, corrects common OCR character errors (O/0, I/1/l), and removes artifacts from raw OCR text as a preprocessing or fallback cleaning step.
Parses structured 'Label: Value' text line-by-line and maps recognized labels to CaseFormData fields, handling species, sex, dates, and string fields with appropriate transformations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with outstanding tasks using a hidden iframe and the browser's native print dialog, rendering cases as an HTML table with color-coded task badges.
Generates and downloads a CSV file of all surgery cases including remaining tasks, with proper field escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex values to human-readable strings, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of SurgeryCase objects by a query string, matching against basic case fields and incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines the CaseFormData interface and constant option arrays for species and sex used in case forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields, date parsing (MM/DD/YYYY, M/D/YYYY, ISO), date formatting, and conversion utilities between Date objects and bigint nanoseconds.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays surgery cases with filtering, searching, sorting, and stat counters (total/active/completed cases, open tasks), plus buttons to create a new case or export a PDF.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open (incomplete) checklist tasks from individual surgery cases and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty settings view component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication via a React context, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status, backed by the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for all backend data operations including fetching/mutating cases, user profiles, tasks, and dashboard data using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining light-mode CSS custom properties (color tokens) for the app's design system, with dark mode overridden to use the same light values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode via class, mapping design-token CSS variables (oklch) to semantic color names, extending border-radius and font-family, and registering the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a veterinary workflow management app, its current feature set (workflow icon component system), architectural notes, and versioning metadata for build planning.
